price: 106. En de meesten van hen geloven niet in Allah behalve dat wat zij aan deelgenoten (aan Hem) toekennen.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
